articles.author: Paul Berger
articles.title: Remote Work Comes to Piloting Ships - The Wall Street Journal
articles.description: A Danish test that lets maritime pilots remotely guide vessels from shore is the latest step in the evolution of shipping technology
articles.content:
RANDERS, DenmarkJoergen Andersens usual commute takes him by boat to a 30-foot-long rope ladder dropped down the side of a ship in rolling seas.
Before he clambers up the hull to reach the ships bri… [+246 chars]
